participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a strong sense of nostalgia and a love for nature.
participant_1.background: My most valuable possession is the memories I've made gardening with my dad. I work and live with my wife, and we love chai tea. I like to laugh and help animals in my free time. I have never been to the west coast of the united states. I like to keep my home clean and tidy, but I also have a wild side and enjoy trying new things like auditioning for a talent show.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Practical and hands-on, with a passion for creativity and a close bond with her family.
participant_2.background: I work on a project at my day job, then go home and build something with my hands. I celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog. My mom is my favorite person of all people. Black coffee is my addiction. I don’t know if I enjoy programming, or if it’s my only choice.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to build things! I am a programmer by day, but I love to go home and work on a project in the woodshop.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What kind of things do you build?
I've built a few furniture pieces, a few birdhouses, and a couple of clocks.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be able to build things, but I don't have much of a knack for it.
It's not too hard to learn! There are a lot of resources online and in libraries.
I'll have to look into that! I've always loved the idea of being able to make my own furniture.
It's so much more rewarding than buying it!
I'm sure it is! What's your favorite thing you've ever built?
I think it's probably the birdhouses. They're so simple, but they're so cute.
I bet they are! I've always loved birdhouses.
I think I'm going to have to get started on building some birdhouses!
That's great! Let me know if you have any questions!
I will! Thanks for the inspiration
